### *Rugby*  

During my time at Hutton Grammer School I fell in love with playing rugby. I soon joined [Tarleton Rugby Club](https://tarletonrugby.com/). This club helped me to develop my form and become successful as a fly-half, so much so that I soon went on to represent my county, Lancashire, and the North of England.

### *Gliding*

Last year, when I wasn't enjoying all that lockdown had to offer, I spent a lot of time in the sky flying around the South of England as a member of the [UCL Gliding Society](https://studentsunionucl.org/clubs-societies/gliding-club).
